name: Knife Throwers
description:
Don't let the knife touch the Apple!

This is my first ever made game, it will get updates!

 Join my Discord Server or check out Twitter to give me some feedback to my game and new ideas how to improve it!

Patch notes:

Bug Fixes

V0.0.2

- In Version 0.0.1 the knifes slowly drifted off the  screen, I fixed that in V0.0.2.

V0.0.3

- /

New Features

V0.0.3

-The Score now will be shown on the Death Screen.

-New Music! Now you can groove while playing! :D Music made by myself.

V0.0.2

- I've added a new Score-System! For every knife you dodge, you get one point.

Tweaks

V0.0.3

-The Score now is shown at the top left corner on a panel and is now compatible with all screen sizes!

-The knifes will now speed up as the game goes on!

V0.0.2

-/
